Class TBitsFileAppender

                  transbit.tbits.common.TBitsFileAppender
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.log4j.Appender, org.apache.log4j.spi.OptionHandler
public class TBitsFileAppender
extends org.apache.log4j.DailyRollingFileAppender

This class extends the DailyRollingFileAppender of Log4java and overrides the append method to send out emails.

Version:
: $Id: $
Author:
: Vinod Gupta
